description:
Join Skims as the Senior Director of Merchandising, a pivotal role driving our innovative product strategies and ensuring alignment with our brand vision. As a senior leader, you will spearhead merchandising initiatives that elevate our market presence and amplify customer engagement. In this dynamic position, you'll collaborate closely with cross-functional teams including design, production, marketing, and retail to create compelling merchandise assortments. Leveraging data-driven insights, you will guide forecasting, inventory management, and pricing strategies to optimize sales and profitability. This role offers ample growth opportunities, enabling you to shape the future of Skims' merchandise strategy while mentoring a talented team. What makes this role unique is its integral part in shaping trends and setting industry standards within a rapidly growing brand committed to inclusivity and innovation. Be at the forefront of fashion evolution with Skims, where your expertise directly contributes to our mission of redefining comfort and style for all.

Responsibilities

  • You will oversee the development and execution of the merchandising strategy to align with Skims' brand vision and business objectives, ensuring innovative and trend-setting product assortments.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams in planning, developing, and implementing seasonal product strategies that enhance our market position.
  • Analyze sales trends and consumer insights to inform merchandising decisions and maximize revenue opportunities.
  • Manage product assortment, pricing, margin, and inventory to maximize sales and profitability.
  • Mentor and develop junior team members, fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment.
  • Collaborate closely with marketing teams to ensure cohesive product launches and promotional campaigns.
  • Stay up to date on industry trends and competitors to keep Skims at the forefront of the fashion market.

Experience

  • Proven experience in merchandising leadership roles (7-10 years)
  • Experience working within retail stores, e-commerce and wholesale channel

Skills

  • Strategic Planning
  • Team Leadership
  • Financial Acumen
  • Market Analysis
  • Vendor Negotiation
  • Trend Forecasting
  • Inventory Management
  • Product Development
  • Cross-functional Collaboration
  • Data-Driven Decision Making

SKIMS is committed to continuously creating an inclusive environment for all employees and candidates, reflective of the rich diversity of the communities we serve. Equitable workplaces foster innovation and excellence, and in our commitment to culture of belonging qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression veteran status, or disability.

$150,000.00 - $230,000.00 a year

Benefits And Culture

  • 100% Company Paid Healthcare (medical, dental, vision)
  • Kind Body Fertility Benefits
  • 401(k) savings plan with up to 4% match
  • Unlimited PTO
  • Full Access to LinkedIn learning
  • Employee Discounts

Perks (HQ Location)

  • Free weekly catered lunch at HQ – M/W/Th
  • Dog-Friendly office
  • Free Swag Giveaways
  • Annual Holiday Party
  • Annual Summer Party
  • Invitations to pop-ups and other company events
  • Complimentary daily office snacks and beverages
